mapper.update: update company set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_id = #{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, email, principal_id, create_date, update_date from company
